data.actual_result: Emoji drawer pops in and out, leaving a blank drawer when disappearing
data.expected_result: Emoji drawer slides in and out
data.short_description: Emoji drawer pops in and out when on poor connection, causing a blank emoji drawer when you delete text
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are on poor connection (easy to tell if your connection is poor enough when emoji drawer doesn't slide in) - Start typing an emoji - After typing part of the emoji, wait for the drawer to pop up and observe the motion - After the drawer pops up delete all the typed text and observe the emoji drawer as it disappears
